sections.heading: 01|Guardian and conservatorship definitions
sections.text: Effective:October 12, 2016Latest Legislation:House Bill 158 - 131st General AssemblyPDF:Download Authenticated PDFAs used in Chapters 2101. to 2131. of the Revised Code:(A) "Guardian," other than a guardian under sections5905.01to5905.19of the Revised Code
